Articles.Content:
I need to remove this heat shield - the largest one - and put other stuff on instead. I find that once in construction mode the engineer can remove and add anything highlighted(green) except the shield, which is also highlighted.

The descriptions on wiki and in game say nothing about whether it can be moved in EVA.

Anyone has more details?

Thanks!
some parts are too big to be moved in eva. if the description in game does not say it can be moved in eva, it cannot be moved. so no, you can't move it
The mod KSP Part Volumes allows all parts to be placed in containers and be moved in EVA construction:

too big

kerbals are not good at lifting dumbbells
